name: politico
text:
Any questions ahead of any of our morning show segments or interviews? Let us know using #RNCwithPOLITICO.  

Check our full schedule: https://t.co/d93cM0A8Gf

name: politico
text: President Trump’s blunt demands that the FDA speed the approval of #Covid vaccines — before it's clear whether any now in development are effective — threaten to undermine the country’s best hope for ending the pandemic https://t.co/tS4JQSWFrU

name: politico
text: The RNC begins. Speaking tonight: Donald Trump Jr, Tim Scott, Nikki Haley, Matt Gaetz, Steve Scalise and more. Live analysis: https://t.co/azZUF4QlQR https://t.co/qDJrL2DCCh

name: politico
text:
Right off the bat, the RNC begins with a nod to some of President Trump's most steadfast supporters: religious conservatives. Cardinal Dolan hits on abortion, immigration and religious freedom in his opening prayer, says @GabbyOrr_ .

RNC live analysis:
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text: A recent @POLITICOPro survey revealed that 62% of policy professionals still track policy manually. This week, we introduced a new tool to help them track policy and collaborate. Learn more about Projects from POLITICO Pro: https://t.co/s3NkMklZ3x https://t.co/ZvHfS9Jgjo

name: politico
text: Miles Taylor, the former chief of staff at DHS in the Trump administration who endorsed Biden last week, has started a group of current and former Trump administration officials and other GOP leaders who want to see Trump defeated in November https://t.co/u2UoeIaST3

name: politico
text: President Donald Trump celebrated his renomination by the Republican Party on Monday in Charlotte, N.C., casting himself as a unifier capable of returning the country to a bygone time of pre-pandemic prosperity https://t.co/frqDxyzD88 https://t.co/ImBFxAJ5M0

name: politico
text:
Trump is borrowing the DNC programming technique of casting the candidate as a type of talk show host interviewing people, says @MarcACaputo.

The big difference: Trump is face to face with his subjects. Biden did his via video.

More RNC live analysis:
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
RNC chair Ronna McDaniel sought to challenge Democrats’ focus on Biden’s affability.

Trump, she said, both empathizes with everyday Americans and is “tough,” particularly on foreign policy and immigration.

Live analysis: https://t.co/ho48EtkRXO https://t.co/wrPpQTy7oO

name: politico
text:
After watching the DNC last week, which featured a handful of “Republicans for Biden,” the Trump campaign decided to mimic the bipartisan endorsement with their own “Democrats for Trump.”

Georgia Rep. Vernon Jones is one of them, says @GabbyOrr_ 
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Jones praised Trump last month as someone who has “united the country,” drawing sharp criticism from fellow Democrats who described him as an “embarrassment” to their party and endorsed his primary challenger

https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Matt Gaetz, one of Trump’s fiercest supporters in the House, declared Trump a “visionary” and rebuked cancel culture in his #RNCConvention remarks.

And he mocked a movement urging progressives to “settle for Biden." 

More key moments: https://t.co/MqraE6PQP7 https://t.co/Hw8prjW05e

name: politico
text:
The first part of the RNC was an attempt at appealing to Black voters. They just stepped on that progress by inviting the McCloskeys, says @mayaaking.

The St. Louis couple was charged last month for pulling guns during a BLM protest outside their mansion
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Rep. Jordan argued that Trump delivered on the promises he made in 2016, despite the economic hole the U.S. is in as a result of #Covid.

And he painted a bleak picture of a country run by Dems, saying Trump “has fought against each of their crazy ideas” https://t.co/gfl89m2Pmy https://t.co/YVb9DGsJKl

name: politico
text:
Maximo Alvarez is delivering one of the evening’s most effective speeches, infused with authentic passion for Trump and real emotion behind his message about the American Dream, says @PoliticoCharlie.

Follow our RNC live analysis: 
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Alvarez's RNC speech is a reminder of why so many Cuban-Americans won’t break from the GOP, says @MarcACaputo.

For them, far too many progressives talk favorably about socialism and denigrate the suffering of Cuban immigrants who fled Castro for the U.S.
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Nikki Haley is one of several potential 2024 candidates speaking tonight. She personally asked Trump for a speaking slot, says @politicoalex.

Follow our RNC live analysis:
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
You can see the outline of her 2024 positioning in her speech – tough partisan with a velvet glove, loyal to Trump but without some of the fawning and boot-licking that we’ve seen from others in the party, says @PoliticoCharlie.

RNC live analysis:
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Two top South Carolina politicians (Sen. Tim Scott and former Gov. Nikki Haley) were given speaking slots at the RNC but not Sen. Lindsey Graham, one of Trump’s closest allies. 

That didn’t just occur by happenstance, says @PoliticoCharlie
https://t.co/pgRtQRBtUz

name: politico
text:
Kimberly Guilfoyle gave a lively RNC address tonight that immediately lit up social media.

She also accused Dems of turning California into "a land of discarded heroin needles and parks.” Guilfoyle is the ex-wife of California Gov. Gavin Newsom https://t.co/lucwv8WARt https://t.co/L8H47ppAMc

name: politico
text:
Donald Trump Jr. blasted Dems as the party of intolerance and elitism tonight during a fiery address at the RNC:

"They want to bully us into submission. If they get their way, it will no longer be the silent majority. It will be the silenced majority"
https://t.co/V4Nff7L4lk https://t.co/FAEznjKGvI

name: politico
text:
Andrew Pollack, whose daughter was killed in the Parkland school shooting in 2018, said policies implemented by Dems in his Florida district are to blame for his child’s death.

“Gun control laws didn't fail my daughter, people did,” he said https://t.co/lucwv8WARt https://t.co/yCKY7Y9EHZ

name: politico
text: The RNC tried to rewrite pandemic history tonight, casting Trump as decisive leader and ignoring the missteps that let Covid-19 spread https://t.co/nSmmVwUium

name: politico
text:
The RNC put Trump’s coronavirus response front and center tonight, depicting him as a decisive leader who marshaled resources, forcefully responded to the deadly threat and “moved mountains” to save American lives.

Here's what it didn't say. https://t.co/XWwwpo1Gqi https://t.co/GW5t8LAsfd

name: politico
text: The U.S.'s latest salvo against Huawei is creating headaches for European telecom operators locked into contracts with the Chinese telecom giant https://t.co/UlFhkLAJDr

name: politico
text:
Analysis: South Carolina Sen. Tim Scott, delivered easily the best speech of the evening.

Had Scott not closed with such a powerful, aspirational message, the first night of the RNC might have been a total downer, says @TimAlberta. https://t.co/l4I2XqBJLz
📷Getty https://t.co/6MtgMxaNk0

name: politico
text:
Cuban-American businessman Maximo Alvarez gave a teary RNC speech decrying Communism and comparing Joe Biden to Fidel Castro.

“I’ve seen ideas like this before, and I am here to tell you, we cannot let them take over our country,” said Alvarez. 

https://t.co/qujr6GoLmN https://t.co/NUecttRt1w

name: politico
text: Watch Maximo Alvarez's full speech: https://t.co/NUecttRt1w

name: politico
text:
Watch Maximo Alvarez's full speech: https://t.co/NUecttRt1w

https://t.co/qujr6GoLmN

name: politico
text:
Former NFL player Herschel Walker was one of several speakers who defended Trump’s record on race on the opening night of the RNC. 

“Growing up in the Deep South, I’ve seen racism up close, I know what it is, and it isn’t Donald Trump,” Walker said.

https://t.co/bI8287rm7K https://t.co/oFFhppnMov

name: politico
text:
California teacher Rebecca Friedrichs slammed teachers unions during Monday's RNC, saying unions are using their “radical agenda” to turn schools into “war zones.” 

https://t.co/qujr6GoLmN https://t.co/Tdkq8ZpVNc

name: politico
text:
The race to succeed Trump as leader of the GOP – whether he wins or loses – is already underway.

Catch up with the RNC speakers most likely to be 2024 candidates, and more superlatives from Night 1: https://t.co/NxmlOJinHm

name: politico
text: MAGA memes are now GOP's official image. And Trump’s family members are the Republican stars — with Donald Trump Jr. getting top billing Monday. https://t.co/haeFqDJBhQ

name: politico
text: Jerry Falwell Jr. said he planned to resign Monday as president and chancellor of Liberty University only to backpedal on that decision several hours later after it had become public, according to a statement from the Christian university https://t.co/TXspZ58oVe

name: politico
text: Analysis: The opening act of the 2020 RNC featured a few strong individual performances but lacked a cohesive theme – like a stage play in which actors read from different versions of a script, says @TimAlberta  https://t.co/WYA5nQ82RA

name: politico
text: Republicans warn of chaos if Joe Biden wins: Catch up with key moments from the convention's first night https://t.co/t5JEeHkRpD

name: politico
text:
Looking for a quick analysis of the most important stories of the day? Tune in to POLITICO Dispatch daily to hear from experts across our newsroom. Subscribe today.
https://t.co/DPUpEFlsul https://t.co/w48vEgYrCi

name: politico
text: Democrats' push to promote mail-in voting this fall could be undermined by an important fact: Some of their key constituencies don't trust it https://t.co/pPUcJrkJk8

name: politico
text: North of Charlotte, N.C., voters of both parties can see through the GOP’s strategy of frightening them about an urban crime wave https://t.co/MqEPEyl2bx

name: politico
text: President Donald Trump has long touted his policy on Venezuela as part of his commitment to fight socialism, but he has repeatedly refused to offer Venezuelan exiles protection from deportation https://t.co/S04DMt0jIz

name: politico
text: Night one of the GOP convention served up dark warnings that Democratic nominee Joe Biden would send taxes sky-rocketing, wipe out oil and gas jobs, “empty the prisons” and have dangerous Mexican gang members moving in next door to everyone https://t.co/lJKAPWjnqO

name: politico
text: The Republican convention on Monday night featured a glimpse of the coming fight to define the post-Trump world: Will it look and sound more like Donald Trump Jr. or Nikki Haley? https://t.co/WbWRTFbnZH

name: politico
text: ICYMI: President Trump packed the first night of the Republican convention with his fiercest House allies, culture war figures, and rising stars eager to follow him into the White House. Here are some key moments from the RNC's first night https://t.co/hyo1FUxMKm https://t.co/O62w1WZtkI

name: politico
text: The dueling themes of the two campaigns — Promised Made, Promises Kept versus Build Back Better — offer much of what you need to know about how the two parties see the 2020 election: The GOP is trying to get Americans to think back to before the virus https://t.co/tjYzCS2CII

name: politico
text: Trump campaign pollster John McLaughlin and GOP pollster Neil Newhouse tell our polling analyst @POLITICO_Steve and… https://t.co/v084UkmB79

name: politico
text: Texas was always going to be competitive this year, with House Democrats looking to build upon their success in the 2018 midterms. But the coronavirus has turned the Lone Star state into even more of a battleground. https://t.co/KnMF7DXFlZ

name: politico
text: Forget national polling, it's an electoral college system. We need more statewide polls, GOP pollster Neil Newhouse… https://t.co/1ENo43Oiuq

name: politico
text: Arizona is a changing state – its Latino population has grown over the last few years and has gotten more political… https://t.co/W6FStWNXZa

name: politico
text: Trump’s handling of the coronavirus could push voters toward Biden in Arizona, a hard-hit state where Native Americ… https://t.co/qmn5UIVsKB

name: politico
text: FDA Commissioner Stephen Hahn issued a mea culpa late yesterday, conceding that he had overstated the benefits of convalescent plasma as a treatment of coronavirus at a press conference last weekend with President Trump https://t.co/bDDT0zhUOx https://t.co/TXeT8hBTgc
